form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono (for herself and Mr. Boozman) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend authorities relating to homeless veterans, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of authorities relating to homeless veterans

subsection.header: Extension of authority for homeless veterans reintegration programs
subsection.text: Section 2021(e)(1)(F) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority for homeless women veterans and homeless veterans with children reintegration program
subsection.text: Section 2021A(f)(1) of such title is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority To provide referral and counseling services for certain veterans at risk of homelessness
subsection.text: Section 2023(d) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority for treatment and rehabilitation services for seriously mentally ill and homeless veterans

paragraph.text: Section 2031(b) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2016.
Section 2033(d) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority To provide housing assistance for homeless veterans
subsection.text: Section 2041(c) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting September 30, 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority To provide financial assistance for supportive services for very low-Income veteran families in permanent housing
subsection.text: Section 2044(e)(1)(E) of such title is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority for grant program for homeless veterans with special needs
subsection.text: Section 2061(d)(1) of such title is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2016.

subsection.header: Extension of authority for the Advisory Committee on Homeless Veterans
subsection.text: Section 2066(d) of such title is amended by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2016.
